alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:07PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BEAUFORT, CHARLESTON, COLLETON AND JASPER COUNTIES... At 207 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Jacksonboro to near Lemon Island, and moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph and excessive cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. All outdoor activities should cease. Move indoors immediately. Some locations in the path of these storms include... Hilton Head Island, Beaufort, Port Royal, Edisto Beach, Johns Island, Clarendon, Jasper, and Hollywood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 15 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
